summary: Innovative, meticulous and versatile linguist with extensive professional and academic experience in a wide range of areas including: writing and editing for websites and print, SEO, content management and social media/online marketing, translation and English language training.

school.name: London Chamber of Commerce and Industry

education.degree_name: Further Certificate for Teachers of Business English

authors.headline: Editor / (Copy)Writer / Translator (NL-EN) / English Trainer at Alphabet Town

courses.name: Time Out Cultural Journalism certificate course

profile_positions.description:
Worked for a number of clients as teacher, editor, writer and translator including: the University of Amsterdam, Mama Cash, Amsterdam School of the Arts, ‘Architectura en Natura’ publishers, City of Amsterdam/ i amsterdam. Project completed include: 

•	Edited, rewrote and translated a series of articles for Mama Cash, an NGO supporting women’s and transgender rights groups in Asia, Africa;
•	Wrote series of cultural articles for Time Out Amsterdam;
•	Editor, writer and translator for the Amsterdam School of the Arts, ‘Architectura en Natura’, City of Amsterdam/ i amsterdam, University of Amsterdam Amsterdam Business School and Faculty of Economics and Business: various publications, brochures, study guides, promotional material, marketing material.

Areas of expertise:
* Editing / sub-editing
* Translation (Dutch-English)
* Writing for print
* Writing for websites/SEO
* Content Management
* English language training / course design
* Press releases
* Social media and online marketing
profile_positions.title: Freelance Editor / (Copy)Writer / Translator (Ned-Eng) / English Trainer
Writer/journalist, editor and online communications manager

profile_positions.description:
Editor / (Copy)Writer / Translator / Teacher for Communications Office of the University of Amsterdam(UvA). Responsible for translating, writing and editing key University texts including news messages for corporate and staff websites, presentations and press releases for central service units, faculties and the Executive Board and student services newsletters. Key achievements included:

* Developed and wrote 'UvA English Style Guide' used throughout the University
* Designed and taught 'UvA Web Writing Course': held twice annually dealing with key grammatical. editing, writing and translation concepts offered to UvA employees from all units, faculties and affiliated institutes.
* Writer/journalist for 'UvA in the Spotlight' section: interviews conducted with innovative and world-renowned professors and researchers from the UvA including Louise Fresco, Erik Verlinde and Susan Bögels
* Contributed to and helped design new UvAweb launched in autumn 2012, including designing navigation structure and new content.
* Actively involved in producing content for revamped UvA social media sites (Facebook and Twitter)
profile_positions.title: Editor / Content Manager / (Copy)Writer / Translator (Ned-Eng) / English Teacher

profile_positions.description:
English teacher responsible for providing language training, writing and presentation workshops to clients including various ministries of the Dutch government, the Dutch police force, ABN AMRO, Radio 538, NS (Dutch national railways), Optiver and Schiphol Group. Key areas of expertise:

* Course design and planning
• Business English and English for Academic Purposes
* IELTS and Cambridge English exam preparation
profile_positions.title: English Teacher
